articles.content: For the Class of 2020, there are no stages to walk across, no tearful goodbye hugs, no clinking-glass toasts; the COVID-19 pandemic has forced this year's graduates to get creative. And nothing says pomp and circumstance like visiting the cosmos: SpaceX is in… [+1433 chars]

articles.author: Sebastian Kettley
articles.title: Rising sea-levels: Study confirms humans are to blame, NOT changes in Earth's orbit - Express.co.uk
articles.description: RISING sea-levels are a consequence of human activities and not variations in the planet's orbit of the Sun, US scientists have announced.
